## Editor.Rules.ReferenceJsonEditorRule.editValue() method

Evaluates a property, array or literal value for reference replacement.

**Signature:**

```typescript
editValue(value: JsonValue, state: JsonEditorState): DetailedResult<JsonValue, JsonEditFailureReason>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | [JsonValue](./ts-json.jsonvalue.md) | The [value](./ts-json.jsonvalue.md) of the property to be considered. |
|  state | [JsonEditorState](./ts-json.editor.jsoneditorstate.md) | The [editor state](./ts-json.editor.jsoneditorstate.md) for the object being edited. |

**Returns:**

DetailedResult&lt;[JsonValue](./ts-json.jsonvalue.md)<!-- -->, [JsonEditFailureReason](./ts-json.editor.jsoneditfailurereason.md)<!-- -->&gt;
